downloadDescription: Marc Mercuri is back to announce a great new website and program for developers on Microsoft Robotics Studio, RoboChamps!
detailsSection: Marc Mercuri is an Architect on the Platform Architecture team, where he is both driving RoboChamps project and contributing to content on S+S. Marc has been in the industry for 15 years, the last 5 in senior roles across Microsoft in consulting, incubation, and evangelism. Marc is the author of Beginning Information Cards and CardSpace: From Novice to Professional, and co-authored the books Windows Communication Foundation Unleashed! and Windows Communication Foundation: Hands On!
systemRequirementsSection: Presentations are played using the Microsoft Windows Media Player.
installInstructionSection:
- Select "Save this Program to Disk" to copy the download to your machine for installation at a later time.
- Once the file has been downloaded, execute it in order to extract the media file.
